title: Foxpup
author: Foxpup
content: Today marks the 4.5th anniversary of the Merit Cycling Club, and on this admittedly arbitrary occasion, I am pleased to announce that both GazetaBitcoin and fillippone have proved themselves worthy of promotion to fully-felched fledged Merit Cycler with the full pay and privileges that that position bestows. Congratulations. Image copyright 2023 Foxpup. Model is over 18 years of age.(Now with a new image host free of Cloudflare's bullshit.)I can also assure everyone that this decision was based on wholly objective criteria and was in no way influenced by any ðŸ¦Š NSFW under the table shenanigans. ðŸ¦Š (To be clear, I'm not necessarily denying that such shenanigans took place, only that they influenced my objective decision making.)Local rules: You know how this works by now. No *phobic disparagement of my fox hole, no matter how infamous it has become at this point.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Let me be the first to congratulate GazetaBitcoin and fillippone! I'll drink to that 4.5 years, time flies when you're having fun

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: O M G!I am more than surprised by our queen's kindness towards us! Thank you Supreme Leader for all your mercy! Again, I have not enough words for expressing my gratitude!Of course, in order to properly reflect the upgrade, I also adapted my Personal Text And congrats fillippone for your promotion to Fully felched fledged position!Quote from: LoyceV on September 13, 2023, 06:24:58 PMLet me be the first to congratulate GazetaBitcoin and fillippone! I'll drink to that Awww thank youuu <3It should be also the proper time for a short prayer:The Queen of Foxes guides us.The Queen of Foxes teaches us.The Queen of Foxes protects us.In your light, we thrive.In your mercy, we are sheltered.In your wisdom, we are humbled.We live only to serve.Our lives (+wives, + holes) are yours.That being said, I will quote myself below Â Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on March 15, 2023, 06:32:41 PMQuote from: truth or dare on February 18, 2020, 06:15:22 PMfoxhole felchersIt's time to paaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaatyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!!!I also tried to thank to our Supreme Leader in a proper manner, using some precious gems,Quote from: Foxpup on September 17, 2019, 08:46:53 AMyou have to cycle an obscene amount of merit between yourself and other members of the merit/trust gang that exists in the conspiracy theory that cryptohunter's all worked upAnd hoping that she will be pleased

comments.author: fillippone
comments.created_time: September 13, 2023, 06:59:17 PMLast edit: September 13, 2023, 07:19:56 PM by fillippone
comments.body: I cannot believe it.This is a dream made true, and of course, following shenanigans and celebrations will make this day even more memorable!I will quote my not-so-derailed thread: Quote from: fillippone on September 09, 2023, 02:00:02 AMSupreme Leader, your acolyte salutes you. The Queen of Foxes guides us. The Queen of Foxes teaches us. The Queen of Foxes protects us. In your light, we thrive. In your mercy, we are sheltered. In your wisdom, we are humbled. We live only to serve. Our lives (+wives, + holes) are yours.I promise to be a filthy, moustachioed, lustful Italian devoted to you.Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 13, 2023, 06:40:57 PMO M G!I am more than surprised by our queen's kindness towards us! Thank you Supreme Leader for all your mercy! Again, I have not enough words for expressing my gratitude!Well done my friend. It's an honour to share this hole honour with you!Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 13, 2023, 06:40:57 PMOf course, in order to properly reflect the upgrade, I also adapted my Personal Text Done that. Merit Rascal (thanks@ddmrddmr) and Pizza makers had to go!Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 13, 2023, 06:40:57 PMQuote from: Foxpup on September 17, 2019, 08:46:53 AMyou have to cycle an obscene amount of merit between yourself and other members of the merit/trust gang that exists in the conspiracy theory that cryptohunter's all worked upAnd hoping that she will be pleased Â I did my best. ( where are @o_e_l_e_oÂ  @suchmoon and @The Sceptical Chymist ?)Guys, on days like this, I feel honoured to join this incredible community, even if I did it for the most embarrassing reasons.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: fillippone on September 13, 2023, 06:59:17 PM( where are @o_e_l_e_o and @The Sceptical Chymist ?)I hope that The Pharmacist is not doing his best...Quote from: Despairo on February 07, 2021, 01:21:44 PM@The Pharmacist be like Besides, we also need suchmoon here

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: 4.5 years!? What a holestoric milestone! Truly monumenthole. Wonder if theymos will change my name to h_o_l_e_o in commemoration?Quote from: fillippone on September 13, 2023, 06:59:17 PMwhere are @o_e_l_e_oÂ Oh, I've never left:Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on July 21, 2023, 06:42:24 AMUmmm... I've been locked up for two weeks now and Foxxy's got the only key...Help?

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 13, 2023, 07:36:31 PMWonder if theymos will change my name to h_o_l_e_o in commemoration?LOL!Oh well, so while we are having these drinks, for the lulz, let's go back on the memory lane and remember fillippone's inception Quote from: fillippone on October 18, 2019, 01:40:43 PM^^^I am afraid having a time machine is a strict prerequisite ofor this club membership. I am working on that, but takes time. In a funnyÂ  circular reference. Quote from: fillippone on December 04, 2019, 06:47:15 PMI have nothing to do with this thread.But I find it fascinating. Everyone have their own kinks.Quote from: fillippone on December 19, 2019, 03:36:42 PMObscene is capped to 50 monthly merits.I cycled obscene amounts of merits more than one time, but with a different gang, I am afraid...Quote from: fillippone on December 31, 2019, 05:29:52 PMMy wife doesnâ€™t need intermediaries.Count me in Foxpup if you want, but contact her for separate agreement. Edited for clarity so GazetaBitcoin doesnâ€™t see conspiracies everywhere.The whole post is a joke.I might or I might not have a wifeI might or might not be part of the gangI might or might not be jokingQuote from: fillippone on January 29, 2020, 06:24:40 PMQuote from: Foxpup on January 29, 2020, 06:20:00 PM<...>. Also, @JollyGood and @examplens, I'm afraid you lack sufficient cycled merit to become part of the wife swapping merit cycling club, but I appreciate your support. Forty-fifth week paid.What about me? ðŸ˜‰As I said, I cannot advice for my wife, whoâ€™s swapping without me giving consent...Quote from: fillippone on August 06, 2020, 08:11:44 PMAdding more members would make that game so much fun. Asking for a friend. Quote from: fillippone on January 20, 2021, 11:42:57 PMI refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.Apparently, he was a true visionary as well:Quote from: fillippone on May 19, 2021, 07:48:14 PMOne day, I will thank you tooâ€¦

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: How sad that after so many passionate nights with almost every member of this gang... I still have to watch the orgy through the keyhole. ðŸ”žQuote

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on September 13, 2023, 08:06:52 PMHow sad that after so many passionate nights with almost every member of this gang... I still have to watch the orgy through the keyhole.Take the whole thing as an opportunity.Now while you look through the keyhole, try to recognize where you went wrong in those sleepless passionate nights and why you were excluded from the orgy.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Foxpup on September 13, 2023, 06:20:11 PMI can also assure everyone that this decision was based on wholly objective criteria and was in no way influenced by any ðŸ¦Š NSFW under the table shenanigans. ðŸ¦Š (To be clear, I'm not necessarily denying that such shenanigans took place, only that they influenced my objective decision making.)I just noticed something which caught my attention.The visible image is namedhttps://nl.ib.metapix.net/files/full/4663/4663586_GreymuzzledFoxpup_above_board.pngWhile the one from the hyperlink is named https://nl.ib.metapix.net/files/full/4663/4663585_GreymuzzledFoxpup_below_board.pngAnd I am sure that everyone wants to see what's there, below the boardÂ   I did not see it yesterday, probably because I was too dizzy and happy after I got the promotion. So I just saw it moments ago and now I can't take my eyes away from that imageÂ    Quote from: icopress on September 13, 2023, 08:06:52 PMHow sad that after so many passionate nights with almost every member of this gang//Gazeta is blushingÂ   My friend, I did not know that you were impressed so much! Nevertheless, I am more than glad to know that.Quote from: icopress on September 13, 2023, 08:06:52 PMI still have to watch the orgy through the keyhole. ðŸ”žicopress, you peeper! You always peep through the keyhole, don't you? Peeper!Quote from: examplens on September 13, 2023, 08:26:03 PMNow while you look through the keyhole, try to recognize where you went wrong in those sleepless passionate nights and why you were excluded from the orgy.Â  I think I explained that once or twice...Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on March 21, 2023, 10:58:32 AMicopress was banned this year for not saying his prayers It's something religious, as you see. (Perhaps also combined with the idea of excluding Miss BitcoinTalk category from future editions of Community Awards? )

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 14, 2023, 06:46:11 AMI just noticed something which caught my attention.The visible image is namedhttps://nl.ib.metapix.net/files/full/4663/4663586_GreymuzzledFoxpup_above_board.pngWhile the one from the hyperlink is named https://nl.ib.metapix.net/files/full/4663/4663585_GreymuzzledFoxpup_below_board.pngI was wondering if anyone would notice that. There are a few other hidden details in those images as well, if anyone needed any further enticement to look at them (which they don't).Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 14, 2023, 06:46:11 AMSo I just saw it moments ago and now I can't take my eyes away from that imageÂ    What do you mean, "now"? Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 14, 2023, 06:46:11 AM(Perhaps also combined with the idea of excluding Miss BitcoinTalk category from future editions of Community Awards? )While it is true that I was initially disappointed by this decision, I have since come to accept that, by definition, you can't really have a contest if there is only one contestant worthy of consideration.

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 13, 2023, 06:40:57 PMO M GCongratulations on your promotion GazetaÂ  Had a quick question, I have been seeing that fox with cycle since the the day I got to know you. Anyway, What is this Foxpup's Merit Cycling club?Â  Cheers,DYING_S0UL

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: DYING_S0UL on September 16, 2023, 09:32:48 AMWhat is this Foxpup's Merit Cycling club?Merely a practical joke that got way out of hand after a certain infamous user insinuated that high-ranking forum members (including myself) are gaming the merit system by cycle merits between each other. I decided to roll with it because it seemed funny and I had a perfect opportunity to poke fun at omnipresent signature/avatar campaigns at the same time. (I also quite dramatically rolled with another of his infamous insinuations, but for different reasons.)

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: Quote from: Foxpup on September 16, 2023, 10:23:58 AMQuote from: DYING_S0UL on September 16, 2023, 09:32:48 AMWhat is this Foxpup's Merit Cycling club?Merely a practical joke that got way out of hand after a certain infamous user insinuated that high-ranking forum members (including myself) are gaming the merit system by cycle merits between each other. I decided to roll with it because it seemed funny and I had a perfect opportunity to poke fun at omnipresent signature/avatar campaigns at the same time. (I also quite dramatically rolled with another of his infamous insinuations, but for different reasons.)I checked the two links, And I said to myself what the hell is happening! Didn't understood a single thing. I am not old enough to understand, I think. Â  [All I could understood that, some users accused some users that they were sharing merits with each others, that it Â  ]Thanks for replying anyway.Cheers

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: DYING_S0UL on September 16, 2023, 10:50:49 AM[All I could understood that, some users accused some users that they were sharing merits with each others, that it Â  ]That is all that happened (aside from the vixen incident). Like I said, the whole thing got way out of hand. You just had to be there, I guess.

comments.body: Quote from: Foxpup on September 16, 2023, 10:59:10 AMQuote from: DYING_S0UL on September 16, 2023, 10:50:49 AM[All I could understood that, some users accused some users that they were sharing merits with each others, that it Â  ]That is all that happened (aside from the vixen incident). Orgy is remarkable, no questions. Foxes... who don't like foxes? But what's in the BOX?

Orgy is remarkable, no questions. Foxes... who don't like foxes? But what's in the BOX? Here is what's in the BOX

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Legend has it that someone already picked the mystery box, and may have released a pandemic of all-enveloping deadly mist across the entire planet...Sounds familiar...

comments.author: jokers10
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 16, 2023, 12:15:46 PMLegend has it that someone already picked the mystery box, and may have released a pandemic of all-enveloping deadly mist across the entire planet...Sounds familiar...Wow!  It was a really valuable thing. I expected something like "a piece of string, a piece of hard candy, an old penny, and a World's Greatest Grandpa keychain", but it exceeds any of my expectations! Even if it was pretty logical: a mystery box to hold a mist, what else? (Maybe... some mister?..) Thanks for sharing this legend!

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: jokers10 on September 16, 2023, 12:45:04 PMWow!  It was a really valuable thing. I expected something like "a piece of string, a piece of hard candy, an old penny, and a World's Greatest Grandpa keychain", but it exceeds any of my expectations! Even if it was pretty logical: a mystery box to hold a mist, what else? (Maybe... some mister?..) Thanks for sharing this legend!Don't forget, o_e_l_e_o wasn't the only recipient of a mystery box. There were two other mystery boxes, one containing one pound of almonds and the other containing one gallon of Ideal Fluid Co. zero-viscosity oil. My reasons for choosing these prizes will always remain a mystery, possibly even to me.
